com.github.parboiled1.grappa.matchers.trie
Class Trie

java.lang.Object
  com.github.parboiled1.grappa.matchers.trie.Trie

@Immutable
@Beta
public final class Trie
extends Object

"User-facing" class of a TrieMatcher

This is an implementation of trie designed to search for string constants.

It is a rather "na√Øve" implementation in that it is only a trie and not a much more sophisticated radix tree, but it is efficient enough that searching for a string among a series of strings is very fast (more so than FirstOfStringsMatcher, especially with large dictionaries).

The core of the trie search algorithm is implemented by TrieNode.

Since:
1.0.0-beta.6
